settings.shipping:
Free Standard delivery for orders over $100 and Free Express shipping for orders over $125.

Flat Fee applies for orders under $100, Standard delivery $ 14.99 and Express $19.99.

Orders placed before 11 am will leave the warehouse on the same day*. Orders are typically delivered within 3 to 7 business days from the date of purchase.

For our full shipping policy: CLICK HERE

*Please note that during sale periods, there may be a handling delay of up to 2-4 business days.
